product_name: Chuckit! Pro 25M Ball Launcher Dog Toy
long_description: The Chuckit! Pro 25M Ball Launcher lets you throw a ball farther and faster for your pooch, and offers hands-free pickup. Grippy, ergonomically shaped handle is extra long for distance and ease of picking up the ball; smart design keeps you from having to touch a slimy or dirty ball. Long handle with claw holds ball firmly and gives you leverage, allowing the ball to travel approximately 3 times as far as throwing with your arm alone. Chuckit! Pro25M Ball Launcher fits standard tennis balls-1 rubber, polyester-wrapped ball included.
short_description: The Chuckit! Pro 25M Ball Launcher lets you throw a ball farther and faster for your pooch, and offers hands-free pickup.
